reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Borrowing the words of another reviewer here whose comment cannot be topped : Truly an icon

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Take it, take it, take it! The best History Professor I have seen out there. Always encourages his students to attend office hours, and even asked students to redo their papers if they fall below the class average. An incredible professor he is.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: A sweet and encouraging professor. Classes could better, but hey, let's be nice.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: I really loved Professor Meguid! She's unbelievably smart and really cares about her students. She is very accessible outside of class and super responsive to emails. You can't BS the readings though so don't make my mistake. I was not happy with the grade I received in this class, but that's entirely on me not putting in the necessary effort.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Lectures are confusing, and there’s little support outside class.

reviews.subject: English
reviews.review: Lecture heavy but always willing to slow down and help outside of class. Workload is tolerable and the class is not bad as long as you pay attention to the material.

reviews.subject: Film
reviews.review: he really values student input and contributions, and he speaks to the class as if they're intellectually equal to him which stimulated amazing discussions. He values every student and is super nice. He knows so much about differing aspects of film and is open to new ideas/theories

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Such a great professor I have ever met! He is a genius. I love his lecture. As long as you study, you will ace this

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Excellent professor! Clear, concise, and inspiring I have to admit Mark Bils is a genius in the econ field and he is also an amiable professor. However, he is a tough grader and most of the credits are graded based on the exams (the exams are also very difficult).

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: The exams take a large amount of your final grade, and they are usually pretty difficult. Average will be like 50% 60%, but he will decide final grade wisely. His lecture is perfect. The problem comes from the course material that is not difficult to be taught in general, understandable language

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Engaging and really cares about her students’ success.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Interesting material, but the exams were tough.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Very knowledgeable, but lectures can get a bit dry.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Passionate about the subject and very helpful.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Her lectures are good, but the readings are excessive.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.review: Difficult to understand and doesn’t answer questions well.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Super talented and makes theory fun!

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: His tests are hard, but the lectures are solid.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Tough grader, but very fair and clear in his teaching.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Great professor! Very engaging and always available to help.
